items.todoItem: Know that Paul was chosen by God to be an ambassador of Jesus Christ.
Know that grace, mercy and peace come from God our Father and His Son, our Lord, Jesus, the Messiah.
Remember others in your prayers every day without ceasing.
Stir up the gift of God that is in you.
Keep the fire of God burning brightly within you.
Make full use of the gifts of the Holy Spirit that is in you.
Know that God has not given us the spirit of fear.
Know that God has given us the spirit of power, love and of a sound mind.
Do not be ashamed of the gospel of Jesus Christ.
Be a partaker of the afflictions of the gospel and the mighty works of God.
Know that Paul’s mission was to the Gentiles.
